nws.name: Overnight
nws.detailedForecast: A chance of snow. Cloudy. Low around 22, with temperatures rising to around 25 overnight. South southwest wind around 15 mph, with gusts as high as 25 mph. Chance of precipitation is 50%. New snow accumulation of less than half an inch possible.

nws.name: Friday
nws.detailedForecast: Snow before noon, then a chance of snow showers. Cloudy. High near 36, with temperatures falling to around 34 in the afternoon. Southwest wind around 15 mph, with gusts as high as 25 mph. Chance of precipitation is 80%. New snow accumulation of less than one inch possible.

nws.name: Friday Night
nws.detailedForecast: A chance of snow showers. Mostly cloudy. Low around 15, with temperatures rising to around 18 overnight. West wind around 15 mph, with gusts as high as 25 mph. Chance of precipitation is 40%. New snow accumulation of less than half an inch possible.

nws.name: Saturday
nws.shortForecast: Mostly Cloudy then Chance Light Snow
nws.detailedForecast: A chance of snow after noon. Mostly cloudy, with a high near 20. Wind chill values as low as 1. West wind around 15 mph, with gusts as high as 25 mph. Chance of precipitation is 30%.

nws.name: Saturday Night
nws.shortForecast: Slight Chance Light Snow then Mostly Cloudy
nws.detailedForecast: A slight chance of snow before midnight. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 9. West wind 10 to 15 mph, with gusts as high as 25 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.

nws.name: Sunday
nws.detailedForecast: A chance of snow after noon. Mostly cloudy, with a high near 21. Chance of precipitation is 30%. New snow accumulation of less than half an inch possible.

nws.name: Sunday Night
nws.shortForecast: Slight Chance Snow then Mostly Cloudy
nws.detailedForecast: A slight chance of snow before midnight. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 3.
